invalidAsset.description: This asset details has changed. Please review for your safety.
invalidAsset.modal.title: Review changes
invalidAsset.modal.symbolChanged.descrip: Asset symbols don't usually change. This could be an indication that the asset creator is trying to create the false impression that the asset in question is another asset.
invalidAsset.modal.decimalsChanged.descr: Asset decimals don't usually change. This could be an indication that the asset creator is trying to manipulate the supply in order to inflate the value of the asset.
invalidAsset.modal.nameChanged.descripti: Asset names don't usually change. This could be an indication that the asset creator is trying to create the false impression that the asset in question is another asset.
invalidAsset.modal.supplyChanged.descrip: The supply of asset {{ name }} has most likely been tampered with. As a result, you are no longer able to withdraw all your funds.
